turkish_example_sentence: O kararını ailesine anlatmadığında, herkes şaşırıp tepki gösterdi.
english_example_sentence: When she didn't tell her family about her decision, everyone was surprised and reacted.
russian_example_sentence: Когда она не рассказала семье о своем решении, все были удивлены и отреагировали.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: O kararını ailesine ______, herkes şaşırıp tepki gösterdi.
